__TOC__


Ubuntu Lo``Co teams are doing amazing work and events all over the world, but this work doesn't always get shared. The following are ideas for <nowiki>[[Classroom|Ubuntu Classroom]]</nowiki> sessions on various aspects of running a Lo``Co team and hosting events, doing marketing and more.

* Running an Ubuntu booth at a conference
* Tips for giving Ubuntu-related talks at conferences
* Empowering members of your Lo``Co to lead projects in your team
* Attracting attendees to your events
* Marketing Ubuntu in your region
* ...
* Add your idea!
